column3:
“HIGH CBD LOW THC STRAIN REVIEW

Excellent pain relief, antiinflammatory, and quick relief from muscle spasms.
Moderately potent sedative effect, this high CBD strain is great for bedtime.”

“I was really surprised with this strain. I expected a big body high, but I actually felt a lot of energy after a few hits only. It also helped me a lot to take away my headache and stress from work. I would say it felt more like an hybrid to me. Perfect to smoke right after work to get a little kick, but not meanwhile cause I couldn't concentrate at all ! Very good weed overall for a good price ( 35usd/oz) in Mexico.”

“Very intense cerebral high. I found it's most intense if I'm just relaxing before bed and watching TV. Don't really get the munchies with this strain, usually end up just tripping out with my eyes closed, which is fine by me! In my top 5 favorite strains though, would 100% recommend!”

“Really in love with this strain at the moment. Bugs are dark, dense and full of resin. Tastes and smells like the Himalayas, pine forests, earth, grass, fresh and with a strong citrus note. Effects are a great mellow indica high, no couch lock but a nice floaty relaxation. Made me want to eat everything in the house. Would buy again”
“THEEEEE SHIIIIIIIT!!!!!!!!”
“Made me feel very motivated and diligent.”

“Form: Firebrand concentrates shatter 0.5g
Aroma/Taste: You can tell Skunk #1's in this strain. I don't really taste much other than an earthy taste.
High: Very sedating for me, normally I have to take benadryl to make me tired, but this strain slowly washes over your body. You feel your eyelids are heavy & then you notice your stomach growling. That was the fastest acting indica I've ever had. Within 5 minutes of dab...”

“The afghan shunk #1 that I've been smoking throughout the summer 2016 is indoor grown. The taste & smell profile is very sweet, & piney almost like cotton candy meets New England pine. 

Ok the high is absolutely time bending. Minutes will be hours and hours can be minutes. Although this strain is very indica dominant it gives you sativa euphoria ala Irish Kush. Very smooth, relaxing indica high with little couch loc...”

“I had this strain under the name Silver Skunk. Such an amazing strain. Smells of citrus, mainly pineapple. It's a 70-30 indica dominant strain, and hits perfectly. Very smooth toke, but it loses it's citrus taste.”

“Full disclosure, I don't have a ton of experience with Indicas.

This Indica seems different from others in that you actually feel a little innervated while on it. It can and will put you to sleep if taken before bed, though. It took roughly 8-10 minutes to fully kick in for me, and after it did I found myself following my cat around the back yard singing him the Ocean Man" song. Very relaxing but not couch locking....”"

“I tested this strain from the mmjthc in vernon,bc. Beautiful looking flower, tricomes are definitely there and do they ever glisten, great job to the grower.
     This strain is a very nice strain for bedtime or if you simply have pain and want to relax. It has a very nice taste and smell. I just find that near the end of a joint it gets more harsh than other strains will.
    Oh i must say if you have a problem eati...”
“really nice bud....reminds me of when back in the day Kind Bud was like 10 different smells and looks...this is that...Peace! legalize!”
“I've never felt so happy in my life. everything was so beautiful.”

“Muy buena.
Tiene unos cogollos gordos, compactos, fuertes, con un olor bastante intenso, verde intensos de color.

Sabor y olor en claro estilo skunk"
column4: entre pungente y "maloro skunk" bastante claro

column2: deja una sensación de relajación general importante
column3: baja rapidamente tensión y stress. Perfecta antes de acostarme
column4: para relajarme mejor y reducir mi...”"

column3: “I feel as if someone has tucked me in, gave me warm blankets, and some apple juice.”
“Very earthy taste, feels like a sativa, and all around, a great smoke.”
“does have earthy undertone but with a citrusy fuity finish I like it”
“amazing strain. high on it right now, this bud was covered in crystals and smelled super potent. it hits you like a freight train.”
“Floraison rapide et magnifique, une usine a résine que dire de plus...”
“Perfect body high.. Right away you'll feel better. The after high is nice and mellow.”
“great for goofy mind x)”

“Bonne indica avec un goût et une odeur typique de l'Afghan. 5/5

Good indica with a smell and taste typicly of the Afghan.  5/5”
“Definite euphoric high. Really chill but was able to focus. Would get again.”
“was on the floor dying of laughter and felt very horny but at same time relaxed.”
“Very creep sedation feeling, but happy and hungry, sharp but sweet smell and earthy vanilla aroma..Real Good Strain!!!”
“Good stuff, nice head high with relaxing effect on the body.”
“super get for pain and insomnia one bowl and I laid down to sleep and didn't even feel like moving”

“The best strain ever. After smoking just 0.25 grams of this flower my body started feeling like it was floating. After smoking more I felt like didn't have legs walking was very nice. 10/10 would do again the high lasted 3 and half hours 3 of which I was dreaming.”

“Well this strain is one of those where i'm not sure how to put it...the smell is pretty amazing skunkyness...with a hint of woody undertones the flavor is described as different I donated for a 1/4 of it and its one of those strains that i'm glad to see gone from my inventory its really potent if you smoke too much it leaves your head up in the clouds”
“Very very strong strain, i've take lunch 3 times :D”

“This was FIRE! I like to smoke right before bed and this strain had me stoned, I ordered a pizza and slept amazing. Personally I thought it was tasty. This strain then gave me the munchies then knocked me out.”
“Made me feel very motivated and diligent.”
“bombay”
“Huge buds with just an average scent. Sweet taste. Burns for a really long time. Heavy body high and decent head high. Excellent pain killer.”
“I didn't think weed could smell like menthol but this one sure does. It did give me a mild headache but I liked it overall”

“Man, I really wanted to smell skunk for some reason. In my batch there was no hint of skunk at all and i was dissapointed haha. It smokes real nice though in a joint and smells and looks good. I use for anxiety to calm down, and sometimes i use marijuana to focus and be awake. This did neither. I had to smoke like 2 joints and a couple bowls before i was satisfied that id had enough medicine. Not the lowest potency w...”
“Good to Watch the final du tour de France on a sunday,on a couch!!!”

“Depending on who bred the strain and which afghani an skunk strains used  or Afghan x skunk #1 determines the quality. There are 100's of variations of this strain like N. Lights, Afghan Kush, AK-47, White widow and many other stabilized strains used for breeding all the hybrids of today. Everybody has a version but I'm giving this 5 star rating to the breeder who I think has the best Afghan skunk, a company of breed...”
“AAAFFFFGGGGAAAAHHHHNNNNNN”
